export function PostItem (post) { return ( <>
{post.userName} {post.time}
{post.topic1_1} topic1_link{post.topic1_2}
{post.title}
{post.text}
{post.reply} {post.retweet} {post.Like}
{post.userName2} {post.time2}
{post.topic2} {post.topic2_link}
{post.reply2} {post.retweet2} {post.Like2}
); };
